pr_title: ISPN-10898 Add BlockHound to test suite to make sure cpu threads are n…

timeline.message:
ISPN-10898 Add BlockHound to test suite to make sure cpu threads are never blocked

* Add BlockHound dep to javadoc

timeline.bodyText:
have you tried to exclude the package?
See https://github.com/infinispan/infinispan/blob/master/javadoc/javadoc-all/pom.xml#L311
it seems a better fix than add it as a dependency. AFAIK, it is only a test dependency, right?
timeline.author: pruivo

replies.bodyText: @pruivo ideally our users would also use BlockHound and our integration would warn them when they use blocking methods in callbacks that should be non-blocking, like listeners, or even cache.putAsync(key, value).thenAccept(__ -> cache.put(key2, value2)
replies.author: danberindei

replies.bodyText: Actually the more I think about it we may want to include the BlockHoundIntegration in the Javadoc so users can be aware of it. Thus I would say to keep this PR as is.
replies.author: wburns
